alert.note: Alert for Finney; Gray; Haskell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 9:08PM CDT until June 23 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Finney County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Gray County in southwestern Kansas... Northeastern Haskell County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 908 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Garden City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pierceville, Charleston and Ingalls. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
